name: Hongkong
description: The Hongkong Token project aims to transfer the futuristic state of Hong Kong city to the metaverse universe.In our metaverse universe, users will be able to socialize with their friends, buy and sell NFTs, and participate in events. People will be able to use Hongkong Token as the official currency of our metaverse. Within the metaverse you can stake Hongkong Token, buy and sell NFT and use it to trade in stores. Our long-term goal is to scale up the metaverse map to miles. In this way, people in the metaverse can do their daily activities, socialize with their friends, watch newly released movies, attend live concerts and much more. All this will happen with the ecosystem that Hongkong Token will establish..
